Comment: I read his wife's charity's about us page and as far as I can tell it's essentially just a phone line. And it sounds like all they do is direct people to non-governmental resources (so her hubby can defund state programs no doubt). So this "charity" doesn't actually provide tangible benefits to anyone, they are just a glorified google. But moreover, like nearly all conservative "charities", it's primary purpose is to establish a tax-free revenue stream for the owner. Big surprise.
Author: LW_GLAZER
